law.catch_line: This subtitle does not limit the right of any individual to engage in a health occupation that the i...

text.section: This subtitle does not limit the right of any individual to engage in a health occupation that the individual otherwise is authorized to engage in under the Health Occupations Article.
The Commission has the authority to adopt and enforce rules and regulations regarding the standards of practice of rehabilitation counselors and vocational evaluators.

Violation of the rules and regulations adopted or enforced by the Commission or the State Board of Nursing in accordance with this title by a rehabilitation practitioner shall be grounds for denial of a registration to any applicant, or suspension or revocation of a registrant's registration pursuant to §§ 9-6A-15 and 9-6A-16 of this subtitle.
